title: SHL Verify Interactive Numerical Calculation
description: The Verify Interactive Numerical Calculation test measures a candidateâ€™s ability to work with numbers and use appropriate mathematics in different situations. The Numerical Ability test requires candidates to understand order of operations, perform numerical calculations, and identify errors in calculations. The Numerical Calculation test, though it is adaptive, is ideal for entry-level jobs that require completing simple numerical calculations quickly and accurately.
